Volcanoes are said to be _____ if they have erupted already Dormant Active Dangerous Extinct Active

During Volcanic eruption: Which of the following is not belong? Seek cover and wear a K-N95 mask in case of ash falls and rock falls Avoid low lying places due to lava flows and mudflows Go near the activity in order to assess the situation None of the Above Seek cover and wear a K-N95 mask in case of ash falls and rock falls
Which effect is most likely from a Typhoon? Damage homes due to flooding Forest fires due to lightning strikes Debris falling down None of the Above Damage homes due to flooding

What do you call the center of the typhoon? Rainbrands Tail Eyewall Eye Eye

This happens when the sea level increases during a typhoon, especially from the coastal area Storm surge Flash flood Flood landslide Storm surge
